WorkItem.Description:
Hi, i have this html code:
 
<select name="super_attribute[1021]">
<option value="">Choose an Option...</option>
<option value="281">001 Melaike</option>
<option value="280">002 Taronja</option>
</select>
 
My c# code is 
                HtmlNode.ElementsFlags.Remove("option");                
                var htmlDoc = new HtmlWeb().Load(@"" + url);
 
When examine the htmlDoc object,
 
htmlDoc.DocumentNode.InnerHtml it's equal at
 
<select name="super_attribute[1021]">
            <option>Choose an Option...</option>
          </select>
 
how can I only have the first option of the select? 
 
thanks,
regards
